title: CAF members begin 14-day isolation in Halifax prior to COVID-19 mission
description: Members of the Canadian Armed Forces, mostly Royal Canadian Navy members, have begun 14 days in isolation at a Halifax hotel.
content: Members of the Canadian Armed Forces mostly members of the Royal Canadian Navy began days in isolation at a Halifax hotel on Thursday It is a precaution against COVID infection prior to setting out to sea for potential deployment to Canadian communi chars
